Topic.Title: Advertisement sneaked in and got categorized

Posts.EditableText:
I know the mods are busy, I am just leaving this here for future reference.
Also to encourage others to reveal the other hiding ads too.

There is completely no game in the following categorized game:
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/yahre9xlrkqdtfwhq8thkw/features-expected-in-android-11

This link is not an advertisement, but it have no game in it at all.
https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/0kns_vbbr06jb6s4cafe1g/rdx
